name: Some Gum Fun
description:
Game Jam Submission

3rd Year Vega Students, Cape Town, South Africa

Twin Hydro Studios

  •  Michael S. Engelbrecht
  •  Simon Baumann

Some Gum Fun is a puzzle/platformer game focused on physics, ragdoll, gummy bears, and plenty of gum fun! Reborn and directed to rediscover all your abilities through the help of imagination and fun. 

The game is still in development and pre-pre-pre alpha stage. Any feedback would be much appreciated! Many thanks in advance! Now, go have some gum fun!

PS: Secret at the end for masochists - definitely worth it /s

Controls:

  • W - Move forward
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Move Back
  • D - Move Right
  • C - Crouch
  • SPACE - Jump
  • E - Increase tool action (when applicable)
  • Q - Decrease tool action (when applicable)
  • SCROLL - Switch tools
  • LMB - Action (Depending on the selected tool)
  • RMB - Alt Fire/Throw objects when grabbing
